name: analog-discord
description: Full-featured Discord clone with servers, channels, voice/video, and chat

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.build:check: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=require('path');const build=p.join(__dirname,'client/build/index.html');console.log(fs.existsSync(build)?'✅ Build exists':'❌ Build missing');process.exit(fs.existsSync(build)?0:1);"
